text: Stanley Middleton (1919-2009) was an English writer and novelist, who was a co-winner of the Booker Prize in 1974, along with Nadine Gordimer. Some of his better-known novels are A Serious Woman (1961), Two's Company (1964) and Holiday (1974). title: Stanley Middleton
